title: The Dolphins Get Caught Tampering
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss Deshaun Watson’s six game suspension for violating NFL’s personal conduct policy, the Dolphins being fined and losing draft picks for a tampering violation, Deebo Samuel’s 3-year extension and James Washington’s foot injury during training camp.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: The Dolphins are punished following a tampering investigation and fallout from the Deshaun Watson suspension.
